original_text: False teachers like that do not receive their message from Christ. As God's people, we are like a body and Christ is like our head. He is the one who causes the whole body to be strong. He helps us to work well together, like the different parts of a body. Then we can all grow properly, because it is God who is helping us to grow.
korean_text: 머리를 붙들지 아니하는지라 온 몸이 머리로 말미암아 마디와 힘줄로 공급함을 받고 연합하여 하나님이 자라게 하시므로 자라느니라

sentences.original_text: False teachers like that do not receive their message
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 거짓 교사들은 그들의 메시지를 받지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: As God's people, we are like a body
and Christ is like our head
He is the one who causes the whole body to be strong
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 온 몸을 강하게 만드시는 분입니다

sentences.original_text: He helps us to work well together
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리가 잘 함께 일하도록 도우십니다

sentences.original_text: like the different parts of a body
Then we can all grow properly
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리 모두가 제대로 성장할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: because it is God who is helping us to grow
